verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God is good all the time
all the time my god is good
(Repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's good in the morning
Good in the Evening
Good every Minute and Every hour

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He's a good God, good God, good God
My God is good
I'll priase him, praise him, praise him
My God is good
